title: LF low levels wanting to learn and have fun
body: I am new to the game and am looking for others that are just wanting to have fun whether we win or lose. Trying to learn with friends that are wanting to learn as well. Positive players that help and give friendly tips would be much appreciated. Also, having discord or curse would be a plus a too! :)

replies.body:
I'm low level and wanting to level up as quick as I can :)

I'm Pineapple065

Im always down to help out newbies get involved in this great game :). I myself am only a low bronze player but have been hitting the rift for almost a year and know the basics pretty well. Add me if you ever want some tips or just a fun game.
What time zone are you in and how often do you play.?  I'm in Au. Play in AEST 7:30pm. Low level
